basic_information.scholarship_name: Emma Plunkett Senior Physical Education Undergrad Scholarship
basic_information.committee_name: Emma Plunkett Senior Physical Education Undergrad

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to female students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are majoring in physical education. Eligibility Requirements This scholarship is open to female students majoring in physical education who will be a senior in awarding year Minimum 2.9 overall GPA Minimum 3.2 major GPA Active membership in the UCO KHS Club & the OAHPERD Involvement in the Kinesiology & Health Studies departmental activities Demonstrate commitment to a physically active and fit lifestyle Demonstrate professional behavior Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
